title: Blood & Bone
description:
Chloe
I’ve finally found my mate.Yet he’s the one wolf I can’t have.I must leave before the pain of unrequited love kills me.But when I return to my childhood pack, so much has changed…and not for the better. I have unfinished business here and it seems there are shifters who will do whatever it takes to keep me from learning the truth.
Lach
I lost my mate nearly two years ago and I wanted to die with her.But Chloe dragged me back from the brink.Now, she’s the one in danger and I’m discovering that I want more than her friendship. I want everything she has to give.Especially her heart.*Though this book features characters from the Bitten series, it can be read as a standalone. If you enjoy Chloe and Lach's story, you can read more starting with Bite Me (Bitten, #1) which is currently free!
author: C.C. Wood
